title: Uppercase Word
text: We want the output to be an uppercase string.

title: Letter Indeces
text: To get the first letter of the output string to be F, it is the 5th letter. Thus, the second parameter should be $$5$$.

title: Length of Word Output
text: To produce a $$4$$ letter output string, the third parameter for the substring function in the field text0 should be $$4$$.
